info: Rating, 4 stars,  · February 2023,  · Stayed about a week
rating_comment:
Overall, our stay at the property was satisfactory.
However, we had a few issues during our stay:
1) The caretaker Jewel was very helpful and knowledgeable.
However, his constant presence was not required, or specified, before booking.
2) Wi-Fi was slow, and gave consistently poor signal. Furthermore, availability was limited on multiple occasions, due to data not being topped up, or the modem being unplugged.
3) There was no hot water on the ground floor, which was also not specified before booking.
4) We were advised there would be UK 3-pin sockets. However we were not able to plug into the sockets within most of the bedrooms.
5) There was a constant smell from the drainage, which we had to clean with our own disinfectant.
6) Some of the shower heads were loose, resulting in water spraying around the back of the shower, and onto the ceiling and wall.

It was a great place, it felt like home. I must appreciate the design, cleanliness and security of the house. Communication was super responsive. The caretaker was welcoming, and helpful. Highly recommended if you are looking for a place to relax that feels like home.

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · April 2021,  · Stayed a few nights
rating_comment: This is our second stay in this beautiful home. This house makes a trip to Sreemangal a vacation. A bearer and a guard help you feel safe and cared for. The house is spacious. Four of the rooms have AC. Rooftop furniture was added this year and it helps make the roof a perfect spot for a sunset, or coffee in the morning. We were able to rent bikes for the week and this helped us really enjoy the area. The driveway allows for more than 2 cars and gives peace of mind.

This is a great space for a larger group. The rooftop is very nice if the weather cooperates. We appreciated the house helper who made our trip relaxing and enjoyable. The rooms were large and comfortable. The house felt safe and well guarded.

Thank you Choyon - we loved your place and we will surely come back again in future. I just gave some honest feedback on the cleanliness and maintenance part, which I hope doesn't hurt you but we also understand that managing remotely is not an easy job. We also highly appreciate Javed's help in all sense, he is great and your security guard. Thank you! a Great place to live for a couple of nights.
A beautiful home and great value for the price. Close to all the sites and a wonderful place to stay if you have a big group. The staff is very helpful as well. Would come again, for sure.

Excellent experience staying at Mayfair. The host took great care of us through the caretaker. Very well behaved guards and caretaker. House is big and amazing, perfect of group visits. A great place for its value. Recommend 💯%

We had a great time at Choyon Bhai's place. The communication was super easy and quick and the place looks exactly like it does on the pictures. Also the caretaker there Jewel bhai has been very warm and welcoming! Loved every bit of the stay. Would recommend everyone to stay there!
We have past great time in mayfair

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · January 2019,  · Stayed with kids
rating_comment: "The MayFair" can be the synonym of ultimate stress free relaxation!!Just pack your Bags and your loved ones, and definitely one will enjoy the professional hospitality of the owner.The property is well designed and looks great. It's clean,cozy and with good amenities,that everybody will appreciate. 06 specious Bedrooms, A big Kitchen and Lavatories with hot water facility are few things to describe the comfortness of the property. Care taker Mr.Jewel tried his best to make our stay as good as possible and his local style Beef curry is mouth watering!! (additional charges applies). Thanks to the owner Mr.Choyon for being so responsive and prompt, surely I will recommend his property to everyone,who wants to relax and unwind from a busy metro life.

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · January 2019,  · Stayed a few nights
rating_comment: Choyon's house and jewel's warmth is the best I've experienced as an Airbnb guest in Europe, India and the rest of Asia. Everything is perfect.

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · October 2018,  · Stayed a few nights
rating_comment:
They Mayfair is a really nice , clean and lovely place to stay. Choyon is quick to response. We enjoyed our 5 nights stay. Felt like complete home.
I would recommend this place.
